Market Wrap: Nigerian stock market hits N64 trillion cap as MTNN and HONYFLOUR lead
Published by
Nairametrics
on Fri, 10 Jan 2025
The Nigerian stock market, tracked by the All-Share Index, ended the trading day on January 9, 2025, with a significant gain of 1,300.01 points, closing at a record high of 105,530.74.The post Market Wrap: Nigerian stock market hits N64 trillion cap as MTNN and HONYFLOUR lead appeared first on Nairametrics.
Click here to read full news..
